paper_abstract: System administrator deals with many problems, as computing environment becomes increasingly complex Systems with an ability to recognize system states and adapt to resolve these problems offer a solution Much experience and knowledge are required to build a self-adaptive system Self-adaptive systems have inherent difficulties This paper proposes a technique that automatically generates the code for the self-adaptive system Thus the system is easier to build Self-adaptive systems of previous research required high system resource usage Incorrect operation could be invoked by external factors such as viruses We propose an improved self-adaptive system approach and apply it to video conference system and robot system We compared the lines of code, the number of classes created by the developers We have confirmed this enhanced approach to be effective in reducing these development metrics
paper_title: Goal-Based Automated Code Generation in Self-Adaptive System
